casebody.data:
ANDERSON LIVING TRUST, fka The James H. Anderson Living Trust, et al., petitioners,
v.
WPX ENERGY PRODUCTION, LLC, fka WPX Energy San Juan, LLC, et al. No. 18-1080. Supreme Court of the United States April 1, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
